author: JuliaRegistrator

comments.body:
Please add
```
[compat]
julia = "1"
```
to your project file and retrigger the bot.

Also looks like you are running Julia 0.6 on CI which causes build failures.

> Please add

> [compat]
> julia = "1"
> to your project file and retrigger the bot.



Done, Registrator bot force pushed my changes to this PR.
Actually, hold this, please do not merge.
